title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terror Cells and Infrastructure in Lebanon: A Comprehensive Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Combat aircraft and helicopters attacked a cell of terrorists, terror infrastructures, and military buildings of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanon.

A short while ago, a combat helicopter attacked a cell of terrorists in the area of’ Tyre Harpah.
In addition, combat aircraft attacked three terror infrastructures in the areas of Yarun, Yarin, and Ayta al-Shaab, in addition to three military buildings in the areas of Mis al-Jebel and Kfar Hula.

During the recent hours, a number of launches were identified from Lebanese territory towards various areas in the north of the country.
IDF forces attacked the sources of fire.
